name: 劉玉蓀
objective: 本課程介紹各種數位調變技術, 如 pulse amplitude modulation, (PAM), phase shift keying (PSK), frequency shift keying (FSK), 及quadrture-amplitude modulation (QAM)等, 並比較其優劣.
schedule:
1.簡介：數位通訊系統 (0.5 week)
2.數位通頻傳輸：ASK, PSK, FSK, QAM, MSK (2 weeks)
3.基頻脈波傳送：PAM, 相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型 (2 weeks)
4.隨機程序及雜訊 (4 weeks)
5.分析 ASK, PSK, FSK, QAM, PAM的錯誤率 (5 weeks)
6.新調變技術簡介 (OFDM, CDMA) (2 weeks)
scorePolicy:
作業 (佔30%)
二次考試 (各佔35%)
materials:
教科書:
Introduction to Analog & Digital Communications, second edition, by Haykin and Moher,歐亞書局
